channel.title: Scripting on Charles Ancheta
channel.description: Recent content in Scripting on Charles Ancheta

item.title: Background music while working
item.author: cancheta.dev@gmail.com (Charles Ancheta)
item.description:
Finally found some appropriate background music for when I’m working.

My peers used to always ask me what I listen to while working on my computer, and they’re always shocked to find out that I work in silence. I used to unironically listen to lofi hip hop mix ðŸ“š beats to relax/study to but I get too sleepy. When I listen to music I actually like listening to, I get too distracted.

item.title: Go Interfaces give me a reason to live again
item.author: cancheta.dev@gmail.com (Charles Ancheta)
item.description:
A few months ago I made a meme about Go being my new favourite language (replacing TypeScript) and I just want to share a satisfying moment I had recently.

The Task

In the previous iteration of my website1, I have a few lines in my config that fetches information about my published NPM packages to be rendered on the Projects page. I wanted to do the same for my new website, outputted as a Markdown table, which can be easily imported into the page with readFile.
